text: This page shows the results for Group A of the UEFA Euro 2012 qualification. Germany qualified, and the Turkey went to the playoffs, which in the end they did not qualify. Germany did not lose a single game, with a record of 10 wins. The top scorer of the group was Miroslav Klose (Germany) with 9 goals. Team Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts 10 10 0 0 34 7 +27 30 10 5 2 3 13 11 +2 17 10 4 3 3 21 15 +6 15 10 3 3 4 16 17 –1 12 10 2 1 7 10 26 –16 7 10 1 1 8 6 24 –18 4 * Green means that the team automatically qualifies. * Blue means the team is going to the playoffs. Category:UEFA Euro 2012 qualifying
title: UEFA Euro 2012 qualifying Group A
